scripts.release:prepatch: npm version prerelease --preid prepatch && npm publish --tag prepatch
scripts.release:preminor: npm version prerelease --preid preminor && npm publish --tag preminor
scripts.release:premajor: npm version prerelease --preid premajor && npm publish --tag premajor
scripts.release: ./scripts/check-if-master-branch.sh && yarn test && npm version prerelease && npm publish
